channel.title: Heelp.!
channel.description: heey please can some 1 help me when i try 2 register mine server 2 moparscape server status so its says u can only post one server.sorry but i havent maked a server in the moparscape server status do any 1 know a website 2 a another server status

item.title: Heelp.!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

There are many ways to advertise.

– Websites –
www.moparisthebest.com
www.runelocus.com
www.gamesitestop100.com
www.xtremetop100.com
www.mmorpgtoplist.com
www.gtop100.com

– other ways –
Pay somebody to spam servers with ur ip (idiotic)
Do the above yourself (idiotic)
Make a video and put it on youtube
Do the above with more video sites

Good luck gettin your server advertised!

Read full topic
